thread.title: Charles Chapman
thread.title_full: Ace Ticket reviewed by Charles Chapman

author: Charles Chapman
title: Charles Chapman
text: The Email tickets arrived but when I simply printed what you sent two of four tickets were split over two pages. This caused much confusion and wasted energy (you sent properly printed tickets by Fed Ex when I called for help). The second person I called explained how to properly print the tickets in your original Email by clicking on the right spot (a gray box with no explanation) in the original Email. When you send the first Email there should be instructions on how to (and how not to) print out correctly what you are sending. The first person I called for help did not know what to do or did not explain what I had done wrong.
